materialsCognitionSystem.name: Materials Cognition System Extraction
materialsCognitionSystem.description: Template for extracting structured information about material systems with cognitive-like properties

extractionPrompts.systemIdentification: Identify the main system described in this paper. Extract: system type, domain, primary focus, and operational scale.
extractionPrompts.materialExtraction: List all materials mentioned with their key properties and categories. Focus on functional materials, not just substrates.
extractionPrompts.mechanismIdentification: Identify the key mechanisms that enable system functionality. Categorize by function (sensing, computation, etc.).
extractionPrompts.methodExtraction: Extract all experimental, computational, and analytical methods used or proposed.
extractionPrompts.cssVectorMapping: Map the extracted information to the CSS vector representation focusing on context, dynamics, and performance characteristics.

validationRules.rule: systemNode.id must be unique and descriptive
At least one material and one mechanism must be identified
CSS vector must have at least meta and context sections populated

neuomorphicComputing.name: Neuromorphic Computing System Extraction
neuomorphicComputing.description: Template specialized for neuromorphic and brain-inspired computing systems

extractionPrompts.neuronCharacterization: Describe the neuron model used (LIF, AdEx, etc.) and its key parameters
extractionPrompts.synapticMechanisms: Identify synaptic mechanisms and plasticity rules
extractionPrompts.networkArchitecture: Extract network topology and connectivity patterns
extractionPrompts.performanceMetrics: Identify key performance metrics (accuracy, energy, speed)

softRobotics.name: Soft Robotics System Extraction
softRobotics.description: Template for soft robotics and bio-inspired actuation systems

extractionPrompts.actuatorCharacterization: Describe the actuation mechanism and stimulus-response characteristics
extractionPrompts.materialProperties: Extract key material properties enabling actuation (elasticity, conductivity, etc.)
extractionPrompts.controlSystems: Identify control strategies and feedback mechanisms
